info.description: API for managing finances in small businesses.
info.title: Final Assignment Finance API Rest

get.description: Retrieves the profile information of the authenticated admin.

put.description: Updates the profile information of the authenticated admin.

post.description: Creates a new client user with an associated credit account. Only Admins can create clients.

get.description: Retrieves an account statement for the client within a specified date range.
Generates and downloads a PDF account statement for the client within a specified date range.
Retrieves a summary of the client's account, including transactions, payments, debts, and interest.
Gets the current balance of the authenticated client's credit account.
Gets the credit account details of the authenticated client.
Gets the installments of the authenticated client's credit account.
Gets the overdue balance of the authenticated client's credit account.
Gets the transaction history of the authenticated client.
Retrieves a credit account associated with a specific client.
get.summary: Get Credit Account by Client ID

put.description: Updates credit account details of a client. Only Admins can update credit accounts.

post.description: Creates a new credit account for a client.

get.description: Retrieves a summary of all client debts for an establishment. Only Admins can access this endpoint.
Retrieves all overdue credit accounts for the authenticated admin\'s establishment.

post.description: Applies interest to a specific credit account. Only Admins can apply interest.
Applies a late fee to a specific credit account. Only Admins can apply late fees.

get.description: Retrieves installments associated with a specific credit account.
get.summary: Get Installments by Credit Account ID

get.description: Retrieves overdue installments for a specific credit account.
get.summary: Get Overdue Installments by Credit Account ID

post.description: Processes a payment towards a client's credit account.
Processes a purchase on a client's credit account.

get.description: Get all transactions for a specific credit account.
get.summary: Get Transaction by Credit Account ID

get.description: Gets a credit account by its ID.

put.description: Updates a credit account by its ID. Only Admins can update credit accounts.

delete.description: Deletes a credit account by its ID. Only Admins can delete credit accounts.

post.description: Creates a new establishment for the authenticated admin.

get.description: Gets the establishment details for the authenticated admin.

put.description: Updates the establishment details for the authenticated admin.

get.description: Gets all clients associated with an establishment. Only Admins can access this endpoint.
Retrieves all credit accounts associated with an establishment. Only Admins can access this endpoint.
get.summary: Get Credit Accounts by Establishment ID

get.description: Gets all products associated with an establishment.
Gets an establishment by its ID.

post.description: Creates a new installment for a credit account. Only Admins can create installments.

get.description: Gets an installment by its ID.

put.description: Updates an existing installment. Only Admins can update installments.

delete.description: Deletes an installment by its ID. Only Admins can delete installments.

post.description: Logs in a user with their email and password.
Creates a new product for the authenticated admin\'s establishment.

get.description: Gets a product by its ID.

put.description: Updates an existing product. Only admins can update products.

delete.description: Deletes a product by its ID. Only Admins can delete products.

post.description: Processes a product purchase by a user.
Refreshes the access token using a valid refresh token.
Registers a new admin user along with their establishment.
Resets the password for the authenticated user.
Create a new transaction (purchase or payment).

get.description: Get a transaction by its ID.

put.description: Update a transaction by its ID. Only admins can update transactions.

delete.description: Delete a transaction by its ID. Only admins can delete transactions.

post.description: Confirms a pending payment using a confirmation code. Only admins can confirm payments.

get.description: Retrieves a user by their ID. Admins can retrieve any user, Clients can only retrieve themselves.

put.description: Updates user details, including the URL of the profile photo.

delete.description: Deletes a user by their ID. Only Admins can delete users.

post.description: Uploads a profile photo for a user.
